title: Optimize EV Fleet Charging Schedule
description: A fleet manager needs to create a charging schedule for 50 electric delivery vans to minimize electricity costs while ensuring all vehicles are fully charged by 6 AM.

tasks.description: Retrieve the electricity tariff for the depot, which has cheaper rates between 11 PM and 5 AM.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies the off-peak and peak charging rates.

tasks.description: Get the current state of charge (SoC) and required departure time for each of the 50 vehicles.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent compiles a list of all vehicles and their charging needs.

tasks.description: Generate an optimized, staggered charging schedule that prioritizes charging during off-peak hours.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent produces a schedule that ensures all vehicles are ready on time at the lowest possible cost.
